author: Q U A S A R
title: ZooCardano-Stories of Value

assessments.note: The NFT creation is one of the steps for the Cardano expansion.

This is submitted under wrong category, it doesn't belong under "Fund6 Challenge Setting".

The actual idea is here: https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/These-Walled-Gardens/342321-48088

I like this idea, it is important to harness the values of a user 's assets and access. I think it unexplored potential that needs to be highlighted by the community in regards of safety, education and access abilities across the board. We have a large population where cryptocurrencies may seamed too"cryptic" to dabble and when they try sometimes they get predated upon. There needs to be a conversation of how to address these issues and this could be the begining of it.

With the current NFT craze, the time to do something like this is indeed now.
The community would certainly benefit from this.

I'd give five stars, but I found it was a bit confusing about what is meant exactly with ''stories of value''.
Try to refrase this clearer.
don't understand what challenge is being proposed

Hmm, I honestly have not understood this proposal, also not after reading your apparently linked  'These walled gardens' proposal under the Developer Ecosystem campaign. Do you want to tokenize proposals and the stories of the proposers ? Is this like a next generation of LinkedIn ?  I can see quite some charm in building a valuable and visible ecosystem, but really, this needs more simple words to make it clear. I am therefore not able to rate higher than just 'neutral'.
This is not a pressing issue for the Cardano community at this point. Please go back to the drawing board and propose a much more detailed project.

Though I do agree that our story is our identity, I am not sure that devoting funds to focusing on this would be the best use of our resources at this point in time.  I appreciate the need to create a way to learn more about Cardano, but I do not feel that this is the most efficient way to achieve this given where we are in the evolution of the ecosystem.
Adoption of this specific NFT is unforeseen. So far, no market research has been conducted to assess the interest of users of buying stories of others.

The community could do this with more magnefied approach between community imput brought by vCAs and CAs on a topic of dire focus as assets will soon be deployed through smart contracts in a near future.

This is likely to succeed as such an appealing idea will almost certainly obtain backing from the community.
It is unclear to me if this proposal has a team or is still a one person proposal.
this sounds like an underdeveloped idea by the proposer, not ready to set as a challenge

USD 300.000 is quite some money, and again, I was not able to understand the clear purpose of your suggested Challenge Setting. I can just assume that the Cardano community would be able to address this challenge, not 100% sure what it is. Therefore my 'neutral  rating'
Unfortunately we haven't seen the credentials of the proposer or the team the proposer is assembling.

I do believe that the community would have the ability to create something like this; however, I also feel like the description is confusing.  After reading the description several times, I am still not 100% sure what the challenge is.  In many ways it feels like it should be listed as a DAPP proposal as opposed to a challenge.
All the elements listed are critical for the project successfulness. Especially the users number.
More clear metrics need to be defined for addressing the challenges and the success of such a task.  But I think polishing on details could make this idea a very good contender.

As I understand it, this proposal is part of a larger project.
Given this fact, 300000 USD is a lot of money. Why would this amount be needed exactly?
I'm having trouble assessing this amount without further detail.
vague metric suggested. "Users", "Apps", "Game Development", what does this mean ?

Here you loose me now completely, maybe my fault. You are listing some possible metrics, what tells me that you may have invested a lot of thoughts. This needs a lot more clarity and simplicity for getting my support.
There's nothing to look at so it's difficult to tell if this project can be executed.
I feel that the success criteria make sense but would benefit from a little more detail or specification.

importance: Our story is our identity and we, individually and collectively, value these stories. Stories are cultural assets and must be preserved.
success: More users, better user experience, improved UI. Successful implementation of this will be an NFT of NFTs that contain exchanges of value.
